website_summaries.verdict: An affordable wastebasket that gives you a huge storage capacity and a small footprint.
pros: Skinny profile with large storage capacity
cons: Some have complained that the finish of the actual products don't match the photos

customer_reviews.title: Great for a little space.
customer_reviews.text: This is just the perfect size to fit in between our tub and toilet, I use grocery bags and they fit / work great. While the top is wider than the bottom it is nice and balanced, we don't have any problems with it tipping over. The top is about 7 inches at it's widest and it stands at about 13 1/2 inches tall. I have included a couple of pics to show the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: DDerr

customer_reviews.title: FORGET IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Attractive plot.Space saving shape and fits well in tight space BUT. just plainJUNK Fell apart, bottom just deteriorated and fell out!!!
customer_reviews.author: RUTH O L

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this waste can in Surf Blue, love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for a "Skinny" trashcan. The shape is really unique and perfect for the space I had in mind. I chose the surf blue color. It feels sturdy and easy to wipe down, the handle is a convenient touch. I use the small 4 gallon trash bags, the 4 gallon size fits this waste can nicely, I am able to switch the bags with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Practically Prime

customer_reviews.title: Narrow, but not too narrow
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute, but not as "metallic" as the picture seems to indicate. I was concerned that it would be too narrow and look awkward, but it fits the space next to the toilet well in both my bathrooms. The high and low handle give this a modern look I really like. I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: LVNmommy

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and perfect for limited space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wastebasket some years ago but did not get around to reviewing it until now. (1) It's very sturdy. After several years, it still looks like new. (2) It's very elegant. Despite the low price, it looks like a piece of designer furniture. (3) The small dimensions make it perfect for small spaces. (And in any case, the size forces you to bring out the trash once in while). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Austin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Slim Line Trash Bin
customer_reviews.text: Love this slim trash can. It is made of durable plastic that is easy to clean. I love the slightly longer handled end, makes it easy to get to from the side of the toilet. If you have a small area or toilet niche, this is perfect. Arrived quickly with prime shipping and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: AjLoz

customer_reviews.title: Dollar General quality.  Small but usable.
customer_reviews.text: Read the description before purchasing! It's smaller than I expected but that's my fault for not reading fully. Height wise, it's what you would expect from a small trash can. But length wise when they say skinny, they mean skinny. I originally planned to use this in our master bath once we are finished remodeling. But with how skinny and small it is I'm just going to use it for beside the bed. I still like the design even though it is not what I expected. It was very well protected in its package. Overall, I'd recommend for someone who needs something small and compact. Just read the description before purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingQueen

customer_reviews.title: Oh, How I Love to Find Exactly What I Need - Use 4 Gallon Trash Bags
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small space. One is between my bed and night table. The other between end table and chair. Handle is nice as I can easily grab it and pull it out. These take 4 Gallon trash bags. I use these from seller on Amazon: Plasticplace 4 Gallon Trash Bags │ 6 Microns │ Clear Garbage Can High Density Liners │ 17" x 18" (2000 Count) These are flexible enough to fit an oval opening.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Shopper

customer_reviews.title: “White” is NOT white, it’s clear
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the white trash can, but it is actually translucent/clear, not white. I had a translucent can already and I wanted to replace it because it gets dirty very easily. It’s the same with this trashcan, you can see all the trash inside it from the outside and it looks dirty all the time. I would’ve ordered another color had I known the white wasn’t actually white. It’s also smaller than I expected, but it’s big enough for a bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Mancuso

customer_reviews.title: High quality plastic
customer_reviews.text: Made from a high quality, strong plastic. The metallic flake or coating seems to be bonded to the plastic and gives it a cool look and smooth porous surface that seems like it would be easy to clean. Definitely worth the price I will replace all the small trash bins in my house with these.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Terribly quality. Have had a similar trash can we bought elsewhere several years ago with no problems, buy these on amazon to match and one gets a huge hole at the bottom on day 2 after normal use. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Hendo

customer_reviews.title: Hygiene friendly.  Add Paper Hand Towels to any guest bathroom and your guests will be grateful!
customer_reviews.text: Being Covid Wary this perfectly sized Compact Trash can is a perfect and stylish fit fir a small bathroom. (I also bought the Bronze colored can which is my favorite). As I needed to remove ALL CLOTH HAND TOWELS I also purchased the Decorative Paper Hand Towels so additional Hygiene has been added. The can boasts an easy to grab stylish built in grip. Neighbors and friends are all taking out their Cloth (Germ Magnets) hand towels. Size and style is a Perfect fit. Larger Trash cans are sometimes more than just an Eye Sore. As light in weight as it is the ADDITIONAL BONUS is how easy it is to DISINFECT quickly!
customer_reviews.author: pegge c.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for that skinny spot where other waste baskets won’t fit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, in black, and love, love, love them. One beside my toilet where I barely have any room, and the other in a tight spot next to the dryer to dispose of dryer lint. I also love the open slot on the end to easily grab and empty. These are somewhat lightweight, but it’s not going to fall over in that “skinny spot.” They are not going to hold a lot, but if you just need a modest sized receptacle they are great. I’m very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy and OliverTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Good trashcan, not the best deal
customer_reviews.text: It's a fine trash can but it's not a good deal... I thought it was but after buying this I went to my local grocery store and there were comparably sized (and even shaped) ones selling for $3-4. This is a good quality trash can but the experience reminded me not to just assume that Amazon has the best price, it's not always the case.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer of things

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I'd be so happy over a trash can, but these are perfect! I took a chance and bought the 3 pack, and I am so glad I did. Not only did one work perfectly in the guest bathroom, matching the decor perfectly, but one in the office and in the guest bedroom as well. Great size, easy to clean, nice design...modern-looking, love the available colors and convenient little handle. Great price, too! I had a hard time finding any in the physical stores that matched my specs as well as these. Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: C Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: I was offered a reimbursement for a review. Needless to say they never reimbursed me but it’s ok. It was only $5 & the trash can fits well in my small bathroom. I probably would have given it 5 stars but I hate a liar & it serves it’s purpose. Good small space trash can for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nik@nite

customer_reviews.title: What a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I was using a 52 year old trash can if you can believe it. It had been a wedding gift. Time to chuck and now I have this beautiful and quite inexpensive trash can. It doesn't clank around since it's made of heavy duty plastic or something similar. I was going to order the dark blue but that was twice the price so I got gray. That works great. A trash can is utilitarian and I didn't want to spend much but I wanted it to look good too. Obviously good trash cans mean a lot to Amazon customers when I see the huge number of reviews. Even if your space is large, this piece is very sleek and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Skylark

customer_reviews.title: Fits a narrow space, great color and shape, fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a narrow wastebasket to fit between my stand-sit desk and another piece of furniture, and the wastebasket couldn't be too tall since I need my desk to go as low as possible. This fit perfectly! The color Spruce (a muted light green/khaki) is really nice, different than the choices with other sellers' wastebaskets, and it's not 'shiny' like typical wastebaskets so this does not look cheap or tacky. The price was reasonable too. Couldn't be happier with this simple (yet hard to find in terms of size) item!
customer_reviews.author: LenK

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trash can if you have a small or narrow area. I have two of these trash cans - one is in a bathroom and the other is in the laundry room and we are happy with both of them. They hold a decent amount of trash without taking up a lot of floor space. The handle cut out makes it easy to empty the can when needed. I also like the fact that Amazon has these in a wide variety of colors - we chose the silver and the black. I would recommend these to anyone who is looking for a simple yet stylish trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Jreview

customer_reviews.title: Great Slim Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little trash can. I got the coral because it was on sale for $5, and it was a great purchase. The color is very vibrant, and the design is sleek. I needed a trash can for my bathroom, and it’s a very small space. I was able to fit this right next to the toilet next to the cabinet. It fit great, and the handle is an added bonus. I didn’t think I would need it, but it’s easy to pick up from the floor. The best part is that a plastic bag will fit in it perfectly, right down to the bottom. Really great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mariash Dopey

customer_reviews.title: Great little wastebasket
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these wastebaskets (one in each bathroom and one in master bedroom. They are skinny, fit into tight corners, and come in several colors. And the handle with the hole is perfect for picking up and emptying the wastebasket easily. I looked all over for one to use in my newly remodeled bath with bronze fixtures and was so excited to find this. It blends perfectly with the faucets and towel bars and you can’t beat the price! Why pay $25+ for one when these are perfect?
customer_reviews.author: csbjo

customer_reviews.title: *FACE PALM*
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why anyone would put a 30lb starter for a snowblower in a square box inside of this wastebasket to ship, but they obviously had ZERO common sense. Great trash can, poor shipping execution.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Finally a bathroom garbage can that isn't tiny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically because it was the only bathroom trash can I could find that wasn't super small! This trash can is a little taller than most, making it the right size for a regular grocery store plastic bag to be put inside. It is very slim, which is great for small spaces, the plastic is decent quality, and you can't beat the price. Nice color options as well.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Read the small print
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these waste baskets 7 weeks ago for $4.99 and was very satisfied. Last week I clicked the Buy Again button and found the price was now $7. OK. On arrival, I received only 1 basket. Looking again at the offer I now see the word PAIR had been dropped. At $7 each, they are overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Lauwasser

customer_reviews.title: I tuck it behind my cupboard and it is out of the way but easy to access
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a few years ago for the bedroom, it is great as I can just tuck it behind my cupboard and it is out of the way by easy to access. I more recently bought a second one for my office, for similar reasons as I don't have a lot of space in my study and it tucks away next to my desk. It is very easy to empty as it has a handle to lift and tip the trash out and it is light. It also cleans well, the one in my bedroom still looks as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a slim-enough trash can!
customer_reviews.text: I struggled for years, buying tiny trash cans that would fit between the toilet and sink in our tiny bathrooms, but they were always too small and were a pain to take out -pretty much every other day- to empty out. These Umbra Skinny Sleek & Stylish Bathroom Trash cans are large enough that I don't have to empty out too often, slim enough to perfectly fit in a very narrow space and aesthetically perfect! Bought two in white. Never thought I'd "love" a trash can...Lol!
customer_reviews.author: ACHA

customer_reviews.title: Big hole in the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I've enjoyed having this trash can - fits in beside the toilet and holds a good amount of things. This morning, after just a few months use, I found a big hole in the bottom of the trash can~! There is NO reason for there to be a hole there - mostly I just put kleenex and other small, light weight items in the can. NO reason for it to have broken except that the material it is made of is very brittle. I would return it if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice space-saving design!
customer_reviews.text: Great trashcan for small spaces or bathrooms or single rooms! The handle makes it super easy to move around and the cheapness of it means you can easily replace it if needed without breaking the bank. It's pretty durable, has a generally nice design and is simple and modern. Worth a buy if you have a small space you need a wastebasket for. Vote HELPFUL if my review helped you at all. It'll encourage me to keep writing!
customer_reviews.author: LQ

customer_reviews.title: Super cute 4 a super price😊
customer_reviews.text: I rated this 5 stars except for sturdiness...I've only had this a few days so it's hard to tell how sturdy it will be but so far it's perfect for small spaces and is easy to clean. I ordered the gold but it's more like a bronze which is even better. My mom has mid stage dementia so she's limited in taking care of herself and her bathroom but I want her to feel like her bathroom is hers and pretty and this adds a nice touch to that idea🌻🌺🦋
customer_reviews.author: KathleenHemrichTop Contributor: Women's Fashion

customer_reviews.title: Great company! Sleek and sturdy space saving trash receptacle!
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is perfect for our bathroom! It takes up less space than those big bulky cans and it has a sleek design. The company is fantastic! I ordered 2 trash cans after moving into a new house 1,000 miles away from the only place I’ve ever known. When I got my package, both cans were in the box but I noticed a gift receipt. They gifted me the black trash can! That shows that this company goes above and beyond! Thank you Gadget Deluxe!!!! I’ll be ordering more trash cans for the other bathrooms and maybe the office in this house.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty
customer_reviews.text: Overall...its serving the purpose. Color is perfect for my mermaid/beach themed, guestroom. But gave it only 3 stars, because it arrived with a huge black smudge on it! The smudge never came completely off, when I attempted to clean it, so I just put the smudge side against the wall, to hide it. Inexpensive item— not worth the effort to return or exchange. But for a brand new item, I shouldn’t have had to go thru that.
customer_reviews.author: DMY

customer_reviews.title: Love this trashcan!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first one of these for my camper because I needed something that would fit in a narrow space. I put a liner in it and it's good to go. Since then I've bought two more, one for my office and one for a bathroom. The hole in the end is very convenient for picking it up to dump out or move. The colors are really nice too. I have two bronze ones and one turquoise. Since I line them, they really don't get all that dirty, but they are easily rinsed out. They are also very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Color not as depicted in photo, but worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It is a semi transparent white. If you want it to look like the photo, buy a can of gloss white spray paint, which costs as much as the can. Other than that it’s a trash can that works just fine and fits in tight spots. The bottom is rounded for easy cleaning, but then there are small raised spots in the bottom that prohibit easy cleaning. I would have paid a couple more bucks if they were already sanded smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Small but Mighty
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a ton to say about this, as it's a trash can, but: - It seems true to the dimensions (I didn't break out a ruler, but I wasn't looking for anything exact) - It doesn't look ridiculously cheap; it's a sturdy, plastic trash can - It fits well in the bathroom, and fits a small trash bag well enough In general, it serves the purpose I bought it for, and I haven't had any issues with it! If you need an easy little trash can for whatever use, I would definitely recommend this. Just be aware that it is pretty small.
customer_reviews.author: Amy McVeety

customer_reviews.title: Check it when you receive it!
customer_reviews.text: Except for the fact that it came cracked it was sturdy. It’s pretty and slimline so that it fits in tight spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Judith in SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little trash basket!
customer_reviews.text: The slim profile is great! Fits so nicely between my bed and night table, as well as in other areas of my house. I have these in almost every room - and two in some rooms - for recycling paper. Love the silver color, as well as the aqua, which is perfect for the back porch. The cutout on the side of them makes them so simple to pick up for emptying. Very nice looking, as well as practical. Very glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Okay I don't know how people are breaking this easily! I have knocked it over 100 times!! (I'm a klutz!) I have it sitting next to my bed so it's my fault it is in the way. I'm disabled so having it close is good for me. But I have beat this thing up so bad!!! And its fine!!! So unless you are body slamming onto it I really think it's very durable! And I love the color! If it ever breaks I will be right back here to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hein

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, sleek and stylish design, surprisingly sturdy. The metallic gray color fits nicely with the black/white decor in the bathroom and the slim design replaces the clunky predecessor that needed to be lifted straight up in order to release it from its narrow confines. This one slides in and out with ease. Will buy more for other spaces around the house!
customer_reviews.author: NYCVillager

customer_reviews.title: Color and size are great. Getting bags to stay In place  not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and size of this trash can! The size is perfect for the tight spot by my toilet. The major downside is the shape. It makes it super hard to tie off the bags and hold them in. It’s taller on one side than the other so if you are like me and like to tie your bags so they don’t fall in you will find yourself struggling and being constantly annoyed by failure.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, looks great, and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe the quality of this trash can for the price! It’s just plastic, but the bronze color looks so lovely and it’s incredibly easy to clean. A normal grocery bag will fit just fine inside, but I think it looks a bit tacky with the bag so I don’t put (nor do I need) any kind of liner in it. It’s narrow so it will fit in tight spaces (perfect for my bathroom), but deep and holds quite a lot! I’ve already bought 3 of them for both of the bathrooms and a bedroom in the house! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: They are a great buy. They fit in tight spaces, or simply don't take up so much room. They have a hint of artsy character in the shape! Enough colors to blend with most decors. Easy to pick up without breaking the edges. Rounded bottom doesn't trap small debris and cleans easily. We no longer place plastic liners in our trash baskets (we have more than one)!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eye Appeal!
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant color. Well made. Unique design. Unlike most trashcans, this Umbra Skinny and Sleek is an attractive accessory to for ANY room. Mine enhances an ocean-themed sunroom. The color is awesome. My Umbra has received many compliments! How many of you have ever been complimented on your trash receptacle! The price is easy on us who must budget our funds. Well done Umbra!
customer_reviews.author: L. Cartnix

customer_reviews.title: Small, Easy to clean, Cheap, Liners Fit
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure I would like this since it’s so thin, but I need something small & decent for small spaces. This is great! Modern design, easy to use & clean, small garbage can liners fit, it has a handle so I can grab it from the corner in the bedroom & remove it, plastic wipes off easily to remove my (already spilled) coffee...and inexpensive. Can’t ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these trash cans for my small bathrooms (we live in a small single-wide trailer). I love that they are slender enough to fit in the small space beside the toilet. They have a convenient handle. I gave the sturdiness 4 stars because the material is not as thick as other small trash cans. Overall a good purchase. I am happy that it fits our needs in terms of space. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a narrow trash can for my small bathroom space. This was perfect. It’s narrow but sleek. It’s big enough to hold bathroom trash for 2 days or so (we have 3 people who typically use this bathroom). 2-3 gallon trash bags work Perfect for this trash can. I purchased 2 of these & use the other to hold my bathroom cleaning supplies.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: NOT "Coral pink" color
customer_reviews.text: Bought one each in black, white and "coral pink," to match different rooms. They are all stylish, sturdy and a great price. Clever design and decent size, too! The black and white ones are nice colors, but the "coral pink" one is much more like pumpkin orange, so it doesn't match my coral and peach bedroom & am returning that one.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was prompt and product was not damaged. I love this trash can because I have a small space between the toilet and wall and it fits perfectly in the space and is tall enough to hold a week's worth of trash that accumulates in the bathroom. I have no issues with this product and would highly recommend. It does not stain or hold odors and is easily cleaned with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Baer

customer_reviews.title: Pink Garbage Can
customer_reviews.text: I Bought This For My Toddler Son. Yea hes a boy, & he likes pink. He wanted a garbage can for his new room that was pink & this is the closest color to pink i could find in my price range. I didnt wanna spend a $20 bill on a small garbage can for my toddlers room. I like the slim deaign of the can. And of course the Price. Not much else i can say, it does the Job. I would recommend this Purchase for a Bathroom or Toddlers Room.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica cook

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it says it is - sleek and stylish
customer_reviews.text: We needed to find a trash can for our bathroom that fit between the toilet and the wall. This trash bin fit perfectly. I like that it has a handle because it's easy to slide out and empty into the dumpster. It's a great quality material and I don't foresee it ever cracking even if I were to drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary VanOostenbrugge

customer_reviews.title: Watch this, hold my trash!
customer_reviews.text: Its a trash can. Just the right size for holding bits and pieces of every day trash. Won't hold a household full, but great for an office, or bathroom, someplace you empty your pockets and need to throw stuff out. Sturdy, light to carry, unless its bowling balls you're discarding. Great price, quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Paratore Jr.

customer_reviews.title: More than meets the eye
customer_reviews.text: As far as trash cans go, this one is on top of the heap (do puns work in Amazon reviews?). Super skinny, appears stylish, and does indeed hold garbage. What more could you ask for? I know, I know. You wish the trash can emptied itself. This one won't do that. But come on, emptying the trash gives you the 4 minutes of exercise that you need every day. So really, this is a trash can and exercise program in one. You're welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It does it’s job!
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek looking. Got for my 16 year old sons room. I didn’t want something to big that would hold a lot of trash because I want him to take it out often lol and this was perfect. I slid it right in between his night stand and bed. Would be great for an office as well! Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Katie

customer_reviews.title: Slim waste can fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a slim waste can in bronze for my toilet area. This waste can fit right in, and I no longer worry about scraping the new toilet to remove the can. This was just one of the items purchased during a reno to make my bathroom accommodating to my elderly mother. In the photo you can tell the scale of the can, which fits very nicely is my rather small toilet area. Also shown in this photo is the Toilevator we installed for mom.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a simple small trashcan for the bathroom. That's exactly what I got. I was going to buy a metal can with a lid but grew tired of looking at all of the options and snapped. This one is perfect. Super inexpensive and it's shape and size work for this small bathroom. Sometimes, simpler is better.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased 5!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like one in the kitchen for scraps, whilst preparing salads, etc. I sent one to my daughter/new apt. One in the car, and the others in bathroom/bedroom. Very attractive design. I love the handle. The one I use in the kitchen hangs on a hook when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Cheshire Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Its small..much smaller than what I had thought. I needed a bin for the bathroom, so I didnt want HUGE but this is really too small even for that. I got the black so it doesnt show dirt as much, but it is easy to clean. It's a nice little trash bin, but just not what I am in need of.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Bryner

customer_reviews.title: You don’t know what you had until it was gone
customer_reviews.text: My Intention were to use it for coffee grounds etc. etc. next to the espresso machine but could not find the right size garbage bag that was Tight enough so not to collapse inwards /down into a the basket Unfortunately my colleagues weren’t intelligent nor considerate enough or maybe just to lazy to appreciate The cleanliness of the coffee station
customer_reviews.author: Frank S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice lil trash can!!
customer_reviews.text: So, you can use a plastic grocery bag in there, and it works fine. It's thin enough to squeeze unobtrusively into small spaces, and works well under a desk, next to a couch, or in a tiny bathroom. It definitely changes the game during garbage day, as the kids now reliably put garbage into cans, and not all over their floor or under the bed! I have one for drier lint, too. Super simple.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschooling Mother/Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Wastebasket
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go under my makeup vanity. It's sturdy and small, but holds a decent amount of trash. I re-use shopping bags from the store in it, and it fits perfectly. Also keeps it from getting messy from throwing old makeup and wipes in the trash. Easy to clean, and the colour is nice. Looks a little more expensive than it was!
customer_reviews.author: patambe21

customer_reviews.title: Super affordable and thin enough to fit between a bed and night stand
customer_reviews.text: Honestly i eat lay night snacks sometimes and when i’m done the last thing I want to do is get up to throw wrappers away, so this literally was what i needed, right between my bed and nightstand, i’ll toss what i’m done with in there and no trash will end up around the room. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Justina

customer_reviews.title: I bought 4 so far!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small spaces. I put one next to a desk, one in between the couch and end table, one in bedroom and using one by cat's litterboxes, lined with plastic bags to scoop into. It's amazing how useful these are in spaces where you can't fit a round trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash container. I use it for a spare can in kitchen while cooking because it gives more room the a 13 gal container. Anyhow, the inside is smooth so I haven't had any issues with food or wrappers wanting to stick. Also the bottom is rounded. There are no corners in the bottom so you're wiping it out and its sloped and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Don't Care Bear

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a slim, short wastebasket to sit next to the small chest where I keep my keys, purse and sunglasses, right next to the door out to the garage. This is *perfect*! Although it's plastic, its surface has a nice gloss, and the shape can only be described as classy. It's small enough to be unobtrusive (especially next to a dark brown wooden chest), yet looks snazzy when noticed. Now I have a place to toss the spam from my mail as soon as I come in. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Purse

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and small
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash can. It looks clean and sleek, and it fits behind my door. It's also small enough where the trash doesn't add up, I think it helps me take out the trash more often. It's easy to clean. I got the white, and it blends in with my white walls. Nothing has broken so far, I'd say it's pretty sturdy. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Sumida

customer_reviews.title: Good size, good value
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is a really good size for a small room because it doesn’t take a lot of space. The trash can by itself looks stylish but incredibly sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chie

customer_reviews.title: Loved the price, color works well in bedroom, nice size
customer_reviews.text: I already had one in the bath that was sparkly white and loved it. I like the size and it's interesting that the price changes depending on the color selected. This was $5. Perfect price and perfect size. Love the little opening that lets you pick up the can and empty easily. The opening is great for those with arthritic hands. Very satisfied, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: magickbetty

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can for your plastic grocery bags
customer_reviews.text: The reason I got this trash can is we are a family that reuses plastic grocery bags for trash bags in our bathrooms. Our son destroyed the last trash can but, this little guy fit our bathroom better anyway. Seems sturdy enough and the inside is smooth and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Iztup87

customer_reviews.title: Great size and they look nice
customer_reviews.text: Great. I have 5 of these! Perfect size and the grey is a great color....kind of a dark stone grey. Fyi- plastic bags won't fit these but i don't need or use bags because they are terrible for the environment. Plus the color is dark enough to hide any gop. I rarely have to wipe these out.
customer_reviews.author: family

customer_reviews.title: Really cute!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I realize it's a trash can. But the color is bold (slightly brighter than the image) and it's easy to hold (handle build in). It fits easily in small spaces while able to hold what it needs to hold. It's 2 gallons, so not too big. Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Patch's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect skinny wastebasket
customer_reviews.text: I have these in every bathroom next to the toilet, under a bedroom vanity and in an office. I love that they are skinny. They hold quite a bit and I like the hole which makes them easy to grab from under a cabinet. The brown color is great for our decor.
customer_reviews.author: Goody2Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: That darn spot between the wall and the toilet in the bathroom.... For the downstairs guest bathroom. of course there's more room on the left side of the toilet but I want the trash can to be on the right side 😂. Needed a tall, thin but cute trash can and this fit the bill perfectly!!!!
customer_reviews.author: 🏈

customer_reviews.title: Flat shape channels paper efficiently = holds more JUNK MAIL : )
customer_reviews.text: Flat paper slides down and leans against the side leading to efficient packing. Way fewer trips to the recycling bin than expected. Very pleasant! The bronze color is mostly brown except under lights or sunlight. Then it turns to a handsome metallic sparkling surface. I can stick it under my desk and I won't kick it. Very light - easy to drag aground by handle and toss stuff as you go. It's small so it's hard to overload. Trips to the dumpster are not weightlifting ordeals.
customer_reviews.author: LindyTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this trash can. It fits perfectly in the small space between my printer cart and desk. It may be small but it hold a good amount of trash. Perfect for small spaces in the office or the bathroom. Or anywhere you want a small trash can. I also love the handle that allows you to easily grasp the can to empty. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Felecia Brown

customer_reviews.title: It wobbles
customer_reviews.text: Mine doesn't sit flat. It wobbles. I don't think it wobbles enough for me to knock it over, but it seems odd to make a trash can that doesn't sit flat. As other reviewers have said, the quality is just OK. Update: It doesn't hold very much.
customer_reviews.author: PaintmanjanTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I am mad at myself for not buying this trash can for all of my bathrooms. It is perfectly designed for that small space between toilet and wall. I spent way too much money on "fancier" looking ones. Who are we kidding? Don't we all add a shopping bag as the "trash bag" into these cans. BTW the Target bag fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Carney

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FOR TIGHT PLACES!!  OR WHERE YOU THINK YOU HAVE NO ROOM FOR A TRASH CAN!
customer_reviews.text: I JUST LOVE THIS DESIGN. AND THE VAST ARRAY OF COLORS. SUCH A SCORE I HAVE BOUGHT THREE NOW.... OVERTIME AND THEY ARE SO PRACTICAL. THEY FIT THE 2.5 TRASH BAG TOO perfectly. I have bought them ON SALE and one that was RETURNED! And they will not DISAPPOINT!
customer_reviews.author: DAWN

customer_reviews.title: A Definite Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash can, which is something I never thought I'd be saying. I have a very small bathroom and really no space for big can to be, so when I found this, it really helped a lot! I do think it's easy to clean and empty as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren MacShara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color
customer_reviews.text: It is called coral or orange...it is ORANGE PERFECT for my power room which I just redecorated from stem to stern, myself.....JEFF. Next to commode...it is slim, and high enough. Nice size. $5.00....reduced....the others are $11.99....not bad. Thank You Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small areas
customer_reviews.text: Wife speaking, I bought one for our bathroom and one to put next to my vanity. It’s so sleek that it doesn’t take up much room. It’s a very light weight plastic that it’s made out of, but it doesn’t look cheap at all. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: sean b.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slim fit
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small skinny slender trash can to put between my bed and night stand as I barely any width in between. I found this trash can and it works great. Perfect fit. I buy the small trash bags from Walmart to fit in it. Great buy if you need a small slim trash can to slide between two objects. Great buy for me. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: bam

customer_reviews.title: MAJES A GREAT CUSTOM RECYCLE CAN
customer_reviews.text: Bronze iridescent color is gorgeous and goes well with most wood tones. Unique shape adds a modern touch. Purchased a pack of self-stick Recycle stickers (also bronze) from Amazon and turned it into a custom Recycle Bin ... waaaay better looking than those blue or green cans :-)
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: It does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: Matches the room perfectly. My husband just installed new flooring in our guest room and we’re going with an earthy green for color accents. We already had 2 cans in black like this one for our own room, so we knew the quality would be good.
customer_reviews.author: Becka Brisbin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Design
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my office. It fits under my desk and since it’s slim, it takes up very little room. When full, it can fit a lot of paper, tissues, multiple empty La Croix cans, etc etc. It’s easy to clean and I’ve put it in the dishwasher for a deep clean with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Poirot

customer_reviews.title: Okay, I know it's just a trash can, but...!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is adorable. And perfect for that annoying, usual waste of space between the bathroom counter and the toilet. Fits perfectly, sturdy, and holds a LOT more than it looks like it does. I ordered another one. :) HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tara B.

customer_reviews.title: I originally rated this a 5 BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I originally rated this a five, but after 6 months I noticed a big crack in the bottom. It's just me and my wife living here. We are pretty easy on things. So, in my opinion this has to be really cheaply made to fall apart this easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Great Find!
customer_reviews.text: Nice stylish trash can! I purchased the silver one for my bathroom and a bronze one for my office area. They are much taller than I thought. I took a picture and sent it to some family members and my cousin ordered a couple for her house. Glad I founs these.
customer_reviews.author: T. Macon

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Modern and Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 if these for a beach vacation rental house with 5 bathrooms. Great product for a great price. I like the slim profile because it can fit in tight spaces but they are just as tall if not a little taller than the usual bathroom waste can. The cutout handle is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Tresner

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought 2*!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, when I bought these for both my bathrooms, didnt realize how perfect they would be, they fit in between the sink and washer, and the sink and shelf in the other bathroom, which isn't very wide across, they are a great buy! No complaints*
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great slim trash can
customer_reviews.text: Love these affordable, slim trash cans for my small apartment! I bought one for my desk and one for my bedside. They are the perfect size and don't take up much space. The various colors are nice - I got the gray for my desk and the white for my bedside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little trashcan
customer_reviews.text: It's slim enough to fit into little spaces, tall enough to not be filled by three tissues. Cleans well and the rim is flexible if you need to squeeze it past something. I use one for a bathroom trashcan and the other for a kitchen recycling bin.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is ideal for our guest bathroom which doesn't have a ton of room. I like the color, it's sleek and elegant. It was also a great price! The little handle is cute and it is the perfect size for a grocery bag liner. I would recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you don't have a lot space in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: The thin design of this trash can allows you slip it easily into spaces you wouldn't usually be able to with a more traditional round can. This is also just large enough to use a plastic shopping bag as a liner easily for trash removal.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Greywinds

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous colors and trim fit for the bathroom and utility room
customer_reviews.text: One is in my guest bath and one is in my utility room; I wish I had ordered a third for another bath (the color is currently out of stock). The price was right, with a color array to coordinate with most bath decors. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: M. Frazho

customer_reviews.title: Trashy
customer_reviews.text: It’s good. Attractive and fits well. The one issue for me is that I use grocery store bags as trash bags in the bathroom. This size is too wide and it doesn’t hook well. Bag slips sown into can a lot. Not a huge deal but kinda annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Aviva K

customer_reviews.title: Sleek But Fragile
customer_reviews.text: This sleek, light, inexpensive trash basket is perfect for someone who needs a small trash receptacle that is also an accent piece to modern decor. The only problem I had - for which I removed one star - was the fragility of the bottom. My can lasted for many months, as long as I put only paper and light objects. One day I dropped an empty 8 oz bottle into it...empty, only weighing about 5 oz....and it just cracked the bottom and broke right through it...weird.
customer_reviews.author: Chakra Earthsong

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m renovating my bathroom and needed a small garbage basket to go between the wall and the toilet. This garbage basket was both slim and modern looking. It’s very sturdy, easy to clean, and fits well in the tight space. I would definitely recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Professor A. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Used & Dirty
customer_reviews.text: This trash can arrived today and it was dirty. I'm not sure how I got a used one but I'm not happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hill

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: This wastebasket fits beside my bed between my antique table and bed. It works fits fine and stays in place. Since I ordered from the Warehouse, I got a good price and I have not noticed any flaws but it wouldn’t matter where this wastebasket is located.
customer_reviews.author: Kas

customer_reviews.title: For small bathrooms only.
customer_reviews.text: If you want a small trash can, I guess this is it. It is about 12" high, and about 14" wide at the top, so it small without being ridiculously small. It's stylish and fits nicely between the toilet and sink in my small bathroom. I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: koolkeithnyc

customer_reviews.title: Slim and Well Priced
customer_reviews.text: Price was truly unbeatable and it's perfect size to fit between my toilet and the wall. Tried tl return the black one I initally purchased to get the white one and Amazon just told me to keep it, so I have oen for the bedroom too! Zero complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

product_meta.title: Umbra Skinny Sleek & Stylish Bathroom Trash, Small Garbage Can Wastebasket for Narrow Spaces at Home or Office, 2 Gallon Capacity, Black
product_meta.description: Size:Single Pack| Color:BlackIf you are searching for a small bathroom garbage can, kitchen trash can, or office trach can, that is stylish and modern this may be the perfect solution for you.Introducing the Skinny Can from UmbraUmbra Skinny is a slim waste basket that makes a statement. A wildly popular follow up to the best-selling and award-winning Garbino trashcan, Skinny offers all the most loved features of Garbino, but with a narrow, streamlined footprint that makes it ideal for small spaces.Available in a wide array of stylish colors and unique finishes to match any décor, Skinny features a modern profile that looks just as impressive in your bathroom or bedroom as it does by your desk at the office.Made from durable polypropylene, Skinny trash can is easy to wipe clean and designed to stand up to everyday use. The built-in handle makes it easy to pick up and empty, while the narrow footprint allows it to easily fit into tight spaces where an ordinary bathroom wastebasket could never go.Take an everyday essential from mundane to magnificent and order your Skinny Trash Can from Umbra today!About Umbra: A global product design company providing original, modern, casual, and functional design for the home.
feature_bullets: FITS ALMOST ANYWHERE: A stylish trash can with a modern slim design that looks great and easily fits into narrow openings and odd spaces in your bathroom, bedroom or office

CLEVER DESIGN: Despite its narrow profile, Skinny trash can hold up to 2 gallons and features an integrated handle for easy transport and disposal of contents making it an ideal trash can for bathroom

DURABLE & EASY TO CLEAN: Made of super-strong polypropylene, Skinny trash cans are durable, easy to wipe clean with a damp cloth, and features a rounded bottom with no crevices for dirt, grime, or liquids to get trapped in
ENHANCES YOUR DECOR: Unlike an ordinary small garbage can, this trash can makes a statement with its stylish colors and unique finishes and was designed to enhance your existing décor
THE ORIGINAL SLIM TRASH CAN: Designed by David Quan for Umbra, Skinny takes an everyday household essential from mundane to magnificent

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars25,125 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
